New Records: The Boston Celtics made a record-tying 29 3-pointers in a single game
Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum scored 37 points and made 8 of the Celtics' record-tying 3-pointers
Derrick White scored 24 points and Jaylen Brown added 23
Pre-Game Insights: The Celtics raised their NBA-most 18th championship banner before the game
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections provided in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: The TD Garden crowd chanted 'Yankees Suck!' during the game
Others: Jalen Brunson scored 22 points for New York, and new addition Karl-Anthony Towns had just 12 points and seven rebounds
